sub_title: Senior Research Geophysicist, Aramco Overseas Company
summary:
I have spent the majority of my career in experimental processing of seismic data. I enjoy working with smart people and solving practical problems . My current role is to develop HPC solutions for seismic processing, after having worked on various projects involving Artificial Intelligence tools and techniques. My past experience and research interests include all forms of seismic data processing, reservoir monitoring and quantitative interpretation of seismic data.

I have experience in
- management of in-house and contractor projects 
- staff coaching 
- geophysical monitoring using 4D seismic data (marine, land, OBN and VSP)
- quantitative interpretation 
- processing of a wide variety of data (land, streamer, 2D/3D VSP, OBN, DAS)
- publishing peer-reviewed papers and articles

profile_positions.description: Exploring how tools A.I. techniques can benefit geophysical data acquisition and processing
profile_positions.title: Senior Research Geophysicist

profile_positions.description: Senior geophysicist in a multi-disciplinary research group on reservoir surveillance. Main focus is on geophysical surveillance of hydrocarbon reservoirs using novel techniques and algorithms such as  fiber optic cables (DAS), full waveform inversion and permanently installed seismic arrays.
profile_positions.title: Senior Geophysicist

profile_positions.description: Role involving contractor management, staff coaching and both experimental as well as production land seismic data processing

profile_positions.description: Seismic Processing of a variety of seismic data (streamer, land, OBC, converted waves, 2D, 3D, 4D)
profile_positions.title: Seismic Data Processing Geophysicist
